name: data-api-client
description: A lightweight wrapper that simplifies working with the Amazon Aurora Serverless Data API

scripts.test: npm run build && vitest run src/
scripts.test:unit: npm run build && vitest run src/
scripts.test:int:core: npm run build && vitest run integration-tests/mysql.int.test.ts integration-tests/pg-compat.int.test.ts
scripts.test:int:core:mysql: npm run build && vitest run integration-tests/mysql.int.test.ts
scripts.test:int:core:postgres: npm run build && vitest run integration-tests/postgres.int.test.ts
scripts.test:int:compat: npm run build && vitest run integration-tests/pg-compat.int.test.ts integration-tests/mysql2-compat.int.test.ts
scripts.test:int:compat:pg: npm run build && vitest run integration-tests/pg-compat.int.test.ts
scripts.test:int:orm:kysely: npm run build && vitest run integration-tests/kysely-pg.int.test.ts integration-tests/kysely-mysql.int.test.ts
scripts.test:int:orm:kysely:pg: npm run build && vitest run integration-tests/kysely-pg.int.test.ts
scripts.test:int:orm:drizzle: npm run build && vitest run integration-tests/drizzle-pg.int.test.ts && vitest run integration-tests/drizzle-mysql.int.test.ts
scripts.test:int:orm:drizzle:pg: npm run build && vitest run integration-tests/drizzle-pg.int.test.ts
scripts.test:int:orm:knex: npm run build && vitest run integration-tests/knex-mysql.int.test.ts
scripts.test-ci: npm run build && eslint src && vitest run src/

author: Jeremy Daly <jeremy@jeremydaly.com>
